replies.body: CAN YOU SEE THE CIGAR!!! Its in Graves Recall animation.{{champion:104}} {{champion:104}}
Will the 2015 icons have any effects?
Does the effects (themed emote, recall & LCU profile background) of Team Fire and Team Ice Icons permanent?
I'm surprised Winter Wonder Orianna isn't in the Team Ice Mega Bundle

Those are Christmas themed skins and are legacy, if winter wonder {{champion:61}} were to be included, every other winter wonder skin would probs be there and my wallet would be burning in the deepest pits of hell........
